mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, biz_id, item_code, item_id, item_name, num, buy_price_all , sell_price_all , split_num , split_price , unit_code , batch_no , expiry_date , split_unit_code ,split_ratio ,buy_price ,sell_price from stro_stock_detail where id = #{id} and hosp_code= #{hospCode}

select id, hosp_code, biz_id, item_code, item_id, item_name, num, buy_price_all , sell_price_all , split_num , split_price , unit_code , batch_no , expiry_date , split_unit_code ,split_ratio ,buy_price ,sell_price from stro_stock_detail where item_id = #{itemId} and hosp_code= #{hospCode} and item_code=#{itemCode} and biz_id=#{bizId} and batch_no=#{batchNo} limit 1

select id, hosp_code, biz_id, item_code, item_id, item_name, unit_code, num, buy_price, sell_price, buy_price_all, sell_price_all, batch_no, expiry_date, split_ratio, split_num, split_price, split_unit_code from stro_stock_detail where hosp_code = #{hospCode}

select profitTable.*,(profitTable.sellPriceAll - buyPriceAll) as profit, ROUND((profitTable.sellPriceAll - buyPriceAll) / sellPriceAll,4) as profitRate from ( select B.source_dept_id as dept_id, (select name from base_dept bd where bd.id = B.source_dept_id) as deptName, sum(ifnull(B.reality_price,0)) as sellPriceAll,/*零售总金额*/ ifnull(bfc.name,'其他') as bfcName, /*财务分类名称*/ ifnull(B.doctor_name,'收费室') as doctorName,/*医生姓名*/ B.total_num_unit_code as unitCode, case when B.item_code = '1' then (sum(case when B.total_num_unit_code = bd.split_unit_code then B.total_num/bd.split_ratio else B.total_num end) * bd.avg_buy_price) else (sum(case when B.total_num_unit_code = bm.split_unit_code then B.total_num/bm.split_ratio else B.total_num end) * bm.avg_buy_price) end buyPriceAll,/*购进总金额*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.avg_buy_price else bm.avg_buy_price end buyPrice, /*平均购进价*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.price else bm.price end sellPrice, /*零售单价*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.split_ratio else bm.split_ratio end splitRatio, /*拆分比*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.spec else bm.spec end itemSpec, /*规格*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.code else bm.code end code, /*编码*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.unit_code else bm.unit_code end sellUnitCode, case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.split_price else bm.split_price end sellSplitPrice, /*零售拆零单价*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.split_unit_code else bm.split_unit_code end sellSplitUnitCode, B.item_id as itemId,/*项目id*/ B.item_name as itemName,/*项目名称*/ sum(ifnull(B.total_num,0)) as sellCount/*数量*/ from inpt_cost B inner join inpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = B.hosp_code and B.visit_id = t.id left join inpt_cost_settle ics on ics.hosp_code = B.hosp_code and ics.cost_id = B.id left join base_drug bd on bd.id = B.item_id left join base_finance_classify bfc on bfc.id = B.bfc_id left join base_material bm on bm.id = B.item_id where B.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bfc.code in ('J01','L01','M01','N01')
and B.cost_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')/*结束日期*/
and B.cost_time <=STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by B.dept_id,B.doctor_id,B.bfc_id
group by B.doctor_id,B.dept_id,B.item_id,B.bfc_id
) profitTable

select profitTable.*,(profitTable.sellPriceAll - buyPriceAll) as profit, ROUND((profitTable.sellPriceAll - buyPriceAll) / sellPriceAll,4) as profitRate from (select B.source_dept_id as dept_id, (select name from base_dept bd where bd.id = B.source_dept_id) as deptName, sum(ifnull(B.reality_price,0)) as sellPriceAll,/*零售总金额*/ ifnull(bfc.name,'其他') as bfcName, /*财务分类名称*/ ifnull(B.doctor_name,'收费室') as doctorName,/*医生姓名*/ B.num_unit_code as unitCode, case when B.item_code = '1' then (sum(case when B.num_unit_code = bd.split_unit_code then B.total_num/bd.split_ratio else B.total_num end) * bd.avg_buy_price) else (sum(case when B.num_unit_code = bm.split_unit_code then B.total_num/bm.split_ratio else B.total_num end) * bm.avg_buy_price) end buyPriceAll,/*购进总金额*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.avg_buy_price else bm.avg_buy_price end buyPrice, /*平均购进价*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.price else bm.price end sellPrice, /*零售单价*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.unit_code else bm.unit_code end sellUnitCode, case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.split_price else bm.split_price end sellSplitPrice, /*零售拆零单价*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.split_unit_code else bm.split_unit_code end sellSplitUnitCode, case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.split_ratio else bm.split_ratio end splitRatio, /*拆分比*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.spec else bm.spec end itemSpec, /*规格*/ case when B.item_code = '1' then bd.code else bm.code end code, /*编码*/ B.item_id as itemId,/*项目id*/ B.item_name as itemName,/*项目名称*/ sum(ifnull(B.total_num,0)) as sellCount/*数量*/ from outpt_settle A left join outpt_cost B on A.id = B.settle_id and A.hosp_code = B.hosp_code and b.settle_code = '2' and B.item_code in ('1','2') left join base_finance_classify bfc on bfc.id = B.bfc_id left join base_drug bd on bd.id = B.item_id left join base_material bm on bm.id = B.item_id where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and A.is_settle = '1' and bfc.code in ('J01','L01','M01','N01')
and A.settle_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and A.settle_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
group by B.source_dept_id,B.bfc_id
group by B.source_dept_id,B.bfc_id,B.doctor_id,B.item_id
) profitTable

where A.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and bfc.code in ('J01','L01','M01','N01') and A.is_settle = '1' and B.settle_code = '2' and A.status_code = '0'
